text: Ranjeet Singh Verma (4 October 1934 – 2 September 2019) was an Indian politician. He was a two term Member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly. Singh represented Mussoorie assembly constituency. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Members of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly Category:Uttar Pradesh MLAs 1977–1980 Category:Uttar Pradesh MLAs 1989–1991 Category:2019 deaths
title: Ranjeet Singh (Indian politician)
